蛃字的基本解释

蛃
bīng
即“衣鱼”，一种蛀虫。

蛃字的汉语字典释义

[①]［bǐng］
［《廣韻》兵永切，上梗，幫。］
见“蛃魚”。

蛃字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蛃； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1080第14
【唐韻】兵永切【韻會】【正韻】補永切，?音丙。【爾雅·釋蟲】蟫，白魚。【註】衣書中蟲，一名蛃魚。【本草】丙其尾形也。　又【集韻】白猛切，音蚌。義同。

[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蛃; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1080 Page 14
[Tang Yun] Bing Yongqie [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun] Make up Yongqie,? Sound C. 【Erya·Shu Chong】蟫, white fish. [Note] A worm in the clothes book, a scorpion fish. 【Materia Medica】Bing has its tail shape.　[Ji Yun] Bai Meng cut, sound clam. The same meaning.
